content.description: A student wants to count the number of restaurants in the spreadsheet whose price range is $30 or less and whose average customer rating is at least 4.0. For a given row in the spreadsheet, suppose prcRange contains the price range as a string and avgRating contains the average customer rating as a decimal number.
content.question: Which of the following expressions will evaluate to true if the restaurant should be counted and evaluates to false otherwise?

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
